message.body: Omg I'm so proud of youuu!
Lololol I'm so exciiiiiiited
what I'm more proud of tho
Is that I'm curating Vetri!!!!
Sorry, what is that?
I'm showing my first prof, first mentor, the lady I owe my entire college and grad school experience to! And I will pimp out her show and reception sooooo hard
It's a super swanky restaurant but I'm curating a VIP second fl that they do very private events in
They only serve drinks there and the Cheapest wine you can get is like 200 a bottle
Congratulations!! That's amazing! When? If you tell me in advance enough, I could come to Philly
Oh this will take months to put together and it is a long term thing
I signed a contract w them that I get 30% of all sales and they print out an artists catalog bla bla hire the installer
Yeah, you told me about that gallery space
Yeah well originally I thought the guy was being a creep and just wanted to sleep w me
Haha
But then he asked (basically), I said no, he ghosted for two months
Then when I assumed it was all a sneaky ploy
He basically was like yeah so I still need a curator tho
Oh shit, that's terrible but then awesome!
Haha it was a Tiny bit terrible but not remotely as bad as what I assumed was going to happen
Which was...never hearing from him again and he gives the gig to some dude
Hahaha yeah, often that happens even if you do sleep with them
Hahahahaha oh god
Well I'm glad I didn't. The thing is, I don't care about principles or anything
I just am not that into him . I flirted originally bc I thought I was but then I found him arrogant
Lollll me neither man, it's just that is usually a bad strategy
Hahahaha
Keep me updated on your show as well and let me write something about it
I am on an arts-writing roll
OK! Thanks again for the offer!
Id love that
Also my boss does our schedules like months in advance, so if I want to visit you in the spring, which I really do, I'll need to pick a weekend soon
Visit meeeeee!!!!! Yes yes yes!!!
So probably not the opening, since I'll be swamped with people
*you'll be, stupid autocorrect
